import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./dashboard.css"; import SideBar from "../../sidebar/SideBar"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Dashboard() { const [publishers, setPublisher] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchPosts = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/publishers") setPublisher(res.data) } fetchPosts() }, []) const [upload, setUpload] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchPosts = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/upload") setUpload(res.data) } fetchPosts() }, []) return (
{publishers.map((p) => ( ))} {upload.map((u) => ( ))}

Welcome back {publishers.firstName}! Your current account balance is $50. This page contain the list of books you've uploaded so far with purchased count
